vehicles.description: A white minivan directly ahead of the ego car, occupying the same lane and facing the same direction. The vehicle seems to be stationary or moving slowly, as indicated by brake lights being on.
vehicles.explanation: The minivan dictates the ego car's speed and following distance to ensure safety and react accordingly to its actions, as it is the immediate vehicle in front.

vehicles.description: A white hatchback to the left of the minivan, partially visible and positioned diagonally in the neighboring lane. The vehicle is at a standstill due to visible construction ahead.
vehicles.explanation: The hatchback's position and standstill nature indicate constricted lanes and possible lane merging ahead, which requires attention from the ego car driver.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Construction workers on the right side of the road, located on the sidewalk and road under construction. The workers are focused on their tasks.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The presence of workers close to the driving lane increases the risk of unexpected pedestrian movement into the road, necessitating cautious driving and preparedness to stop.

traffic cones.description: Red and white traffic cones placed along the left side of the ego car’s lane, indicating the boundary of the construction site and leading into the driving lane.
traffic cones.explanation: These cones demarcate the areas where the road is reduced to one lane, directing the flow of traffic, and requiring the ego car to navigate carefully within the confined space.

barriers.description: Temporary green barriers installed along the right side of the road, cordoning off the construction site from the roadway.
barriers.explanation: These barriers serve to secure the work zone and limit the navigable road space, necessitating reduced speed and increased care when passing.

suggestions: Given the situations observed, the ego car should reduce speed in response to the construction zone, maintain a safe distance from the vehicles ahead, especially the silver minivan, and be prepared for the potential of workers entering the roadway. The presence of traffic cones and barriers indicates that lane changes and congestion may occur, so the ego car should monitor surrounding traffic and signals carefully to make safe lane changes if necessary. The ego car should also be watchful for possible pedestrians. Overall, cautious driving with heightened awareness is advised in this construction area.
